StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_MigrateZipCode]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
as
declare
@mcc_code varchar(6), @rec_id int, @zip_code varchar(9), @user_login varchar(15), @update_date date.me, @e.ec.ve_date date.me, @deleted char(1)
declare zip cursor for
select substring(RS,3,3), ZIP from arms..ZipCode
open zip
fetch zip into @mcc_code, @zip_code
while (@@fetch_status) = 0
begin
set @user_login = 'migra.on' set @update_date = getdate() set @e.ec.ve_date = getdate() set @deleted = 'N'
set @rec_id = (select ORGANIZATION_ID from RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION where MCC_CODE = @mcc_code and ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'RS')
if @rec_id is not null begin
if not exists (select 1 from ZIP_CODE_ASSIGNMENT where ZIP_CODE = @zip_code) begin insert ZIP_CODE_ASSIGNMENT (ZIP_CODE, ORGANIZATION_ID, DELETED,USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE, EFFECTIVE_DATE) values (@zip_code, @rec_id, @deleted, @user_login, @update_date, @e.ec.ve_date)
print 'Inserted zip' + ' ' + @zip_code + 'For Organiza.on' + ' ' + @mcc_code end
else begin
print 'Iden.cal Record already exists in table'
end
end
else begin print @mcc_code + ' ' + 'Is not a valid Organiza.on in Mcriss' end
fetch zip into @mcc_code, @zip_code end
close zip deallocate zip
